summary: The diff implements all 5 requirements: category circle styling fixes (REQ-1, REQ-2), social media icons in footer with admin control (REQ-3, REQ-4), and policy pages with footer links (REQ-5). Backend migration adds social media URL fields, frontend creates 3 new policy pages, updates footer with social icons and policy links, adds admin form fields for social media URLs, modifies HeaderCategoryNav to remove rectangular backgrounds and add glow animation via CSS, and updates routing to include policy pages.
